mapper.select: select uaSeq, user_uSeq, uaCateCd, uaName, uaBOD, uaGenderCd, uaBreed, uaRegNo, uaRegDate, uaMofDate, uaDelNy FROM uAnimal WHERE 1=1 AND uaDelNy = 0
select uaSeq, user_uSeq, uaCateCd, uaName, uaBOD, uaGenderCd, uaBreed, uaRegNo, uaRegDate, uaMofDate, uaDelNy FROM uAnimal WHERE 1=1 AND uaSeq = #{uaSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO uAnimal ( user_uSeq, uaCateCd, uaName, uaBOD, uaGenderCd, uaBreed, uaRegNo, uaRegDate ) VALUES ( #{user_uSeq}, #{uaCateCd}, #{uaName}, #{uaBOD}, #{uaGenderCd}, #{uaBreed}, #{uaRegNo}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE uAnimal set uaCateCd = #{uaCateCd}, uaName = #{uaName}, uaBOD = #{uaBOD}, uaGenderCd = #{uaGenderCd}, uaBreed = #{uaBreed}, uaRegNo = #{uaRegNo}, uaMofDate = now() WHERE uaSeq = #{uaSeq}
